<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">tensorflow.keras.models</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_model</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">utils</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">plot_confusion_matrix</span>


<span class="c1">#load the test data and labels</span>
<span class="n">test_body_vecs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;test_body_vecs.npy&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">test_title_vecs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;test_title_vecs.npy&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">test_labels</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;test_labels.npy&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#load the best model</span>
<span class="n">best_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Issue_Label_v1_best_model.hdf5&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#get predictions</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">argmax</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test_body_vecs</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test_title_vecs</span><span class="p">],</span>
                                      <span class="n">batch_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">15000</span><span class="p">),</span>
                   <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># get labels</span>
<span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">test_labels</span><span class="p">[:,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

                      <span class="n">classes</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">array</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">&#39;bug&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;feature&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;question&#39;</span><span class="p">]),</span>

<h1 id="Make-Predictions">Make Predictions<a class="anchor-link" href="#Make-Predictions">&#182;</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered celltag_Hide">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">utils</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">IssueLabeler</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">tensorflow.keras.models</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_model</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">dill</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">dpickle</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered celltag_Hide">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#load the best model</span>
<span class="n">best_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Issue_Label_v1_best_model.hdf5&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#load the pre-processors</span>
<span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;title_pp.dpkl&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;rb&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">title_pp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dpickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;body_pp.dpkl&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;rb&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">body_pp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dpickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
<span class="c1"># instantiate the IssueLabeler object</span>
<span class="n">issue_labeler</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">IssueLabeler</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">body_text_preprocessor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">body_pp</span><span class="p">,</span>
                             <span class="n">title_text_preprocessor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">title_pp</span><span class="p">,</span>
                             <span class="n">model</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">best_model</span><span class="p">)</span>    
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stderr output_text">

</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>
